function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Use of mobile phone data for disease propagation estimation","Impact":"Privacy concerns, potential misuse of personal data","Mitigation":"Adopt strict data privacy regulations and anonymize the data before analysis","Technologies":"Anonymization techniques, data encryption, secure data storage","People":"Users whose data is being used, general public","Owner":"Government, data regulators, technology companies"},{"Description":"Web-based mapping and dissemination of COVID-19 information","Impact":"Misinformation, panic, and public anxiety","Mitigation":"Verify information sources, provide context and expert analysis, promote official health organization websites","Technologies":"Fact-checking algorithms, official information portals, data visualization tools","People":"General public, internet users","Owner":"Health organizations, government, technology companies"},{"Description":"Adoption of biosensors for disease surveillance","Impact":"Reliability issues, false positives or negatives in detection","Mitigation":"Validation and testing of biosensors, calibration, continuous monitoring and improvement","Technologies":"Quality control processes, calibration techniques, real-time monitoring systems","People":"WASH practitioners, public health stakeholders","Owner":"Health organizations, regulatory agencies, technology developers"}]}
